revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Linksys |model=WAP54G |revision=v2 |fcc_date=12/04/2003 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=Gemtek |manuf_model=WAPB-108GL |manuf_rev= |availability=common |type=access point |fcc_id=Q87-WAP54GV2 |ic_id=3839A-WAP54GV2 |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=0.5 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_outer=5.5 |pwr_barrel_inner=2.1 |pwr_barrel_len=9.5 |cpu1_brand=Broadcom |cpu1_model=BCM4712;BCM4712KPB, HA0410 P11, 715951 P; |cpu1_cspeed=200 |fla1=2 |fla1_brand=Intel |fla1_model=TE28F160C3BD70 |ram1=8 |ram1_brand=ICSI |ram1_model=IC42S16400-6T |expansion_if_types= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial= |wi1_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi1_chip1_model=BCM4712;BCM4712KPB, HA0410 P11, 715951 P; |wi1_chip2_brand=Broadcom |wi1_chip2_model=BCM2050 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bg |wi1_ant_conn=RP-TNC |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip2_brand=IC+ |eth_chip2_model=IP101 |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=1 |addl_chips= |flags= |stock_boot= |stock_os=Linux;2.4.20; |tp_firmware=DD-WRT, OpenWrt, |802dot11_protocols=bg |default_ssid=linksys |default_ssid_regex=^linksys$ |default_ip=192.168.1.245 |default_user= |default_pass=admin |oui=00:0F:66,00:12:17 |oui_eth=00:0F:66,00:12:17 }} {{TagLine|Wireless-G Access Point}} :{{SupportPage|vendor=Linksys|model=WAP54G}}
WAP54G v2 serial numbers appear to start with '''MDG2'''.
Same hardware as the [[SparkLAN WX-6800-II]], [[TRENDnet TEW-410APBplus]] :(FCC ID: MXF-A930209G)
Additional FCC IDs of Q87-HGA7T-2 (Linksys HGA7T, high gain antennas) :and Q87-HGA5T-2 (Linksys HGA5T, high gain antennas) ID/OD measurements may not be exact
*[http://wiki.openwrt.org/oldwiki/openwrtdocs/hardware/linksys/wap54g ''WAP54G series'' on the '''OpenWrt''' wiki] *[http://dd-wrt.com/wiki/index.php/Linksys_WAP54G On the '''DD-WRT''' wiki] *[http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=I2pnciMghvI '''Linksys WAP54G Case Opening and Antenna Repair Demo''' on YouTube]
